messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I'm a structural engineering consultant in the construction industry. I have worked here since 2001, lived near Newmarket for 32 years. We need the change only UKIP will deliver. Stop the PFI privatisation of the NHS and end hospital parking charges. Control immigration to prevent overcrowding, wage compression and infrastructure overload. Scrap the Climate Change Act to get cheaper reliable energy. Scrap HS2 and instead improve the rail network. Leave the moribund EU and embrace the world.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop the PFI privatisation of the NHS and end hospital parking charges.
Control immigration to prevent overcrowding, wage compression and infrastructure overload.
Scrap the Climate Change Act to get cheaper reliable energy.
Scrap HS2 and instead improve the rail network.
Leave the moribund EU and embrace the world.
